original: Combat Rating Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!的决斗等级差值低于§Y$VAL$§!

original: Combat Rating Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!的决斗等级差值至少为§Y$VAL$§!

original: Combat Rating at least
translation: 决斗等级至少为

original: Combat Rating lower than
translation: 决斗等级低于

original: master
translation: 主人

original: mistress
translation: 女主人

original: Amateur Schemer
translation: 业余的谋士

original: This character is an aspiring schemer who seeks to manipulate others through deceit and subterfuge.
translation: 此人野心勃勃，是一位企图通过花言巧语来操控他人的阴谋家。

original: Schemer
translation: 谋士

original: This character is an experienced schemer, plotter and shadowy puppetmaster.
translation: 该角色是一位经验老道的谋士，密谋策划者和暗中操控人。

original: Family Man
translation: 居家男人

original: This man is devoted to the harmony and well-being of his family.
translation: 他甘愿为家庭的和睦幸福奉献一切。

original: Family Patriarch
translation: 族长

original: This man is the undisputed head of the family, resolving conflicts and leading with a firm but gentle hand.
translation: 他是家族中无可争议的领导者，采用刚柔并济的手段解决冲突。

original: Family Woman
translation: 居家女人

original: This woman is devoted to the harmony and well-being of her family.
translation: 她甘愿为家庭的和睦幸福奉献一切。

original: Family Matriarch
translation: 女族长

original: This woman is the undisputed head of the family, resolving conflicts and leading with a firm but gentle hand.
translation: 她是家族中无可争议的领导者，采用刚柔并济的手段解决冲突。

original: Master Schemer
translation: 密谋大师

original: Break Up
translation: 分手

original: Your love affair with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§! is ended.
translation: 你和 §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§! 的恋爱关系结束了。

original: Whorespawn
translation: 娼妇所生

original: Seduced
translation: 被勾引

original: Lustful Worship
translation: 色欲崇拜

original: Seducing
translation: 诱惑

original: Murderous Traitor
translation: 弑君叛徒

original: Bodyguard Lover
translation: 保镖情人

original: Through seduction, this character has secured the most loyal bodyguard imaginable.
translation: 通过勾引，该角色得到了最忠诚的卫士。

original: Maidservant Lover
translation: 侍女情人

original: This character has seduced a maid with a quick mind and an ample bosom, using her to spy and snoop around at court.
translation: 这个角色勾引了一位聪敏机巧又有丰满胸部的侍女，她会为情夫窥探宫廷。

original: Lover's Pox
translation: 情人的疱疹

original: This character periodically suffers from embarrassing and unsightly blisters.
translation: 该角色时不时地被不堪入目和令人尴尬的水疱折磨

original: Damnation
translation: 诅咒

original: As the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] slowly pulled me out of the holy spring, the water started boiling and frothing, paint running off the arcane runes smeared on my naked body. Filled with wonder, I realized that the gibbering voices in my head had finally fallen silent!
translation: 就在[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]缓慢地将我从圣泉中拖出来时，泉水开始沸腾起来，覆满全身的神秘符文开始消退。奇迹出现了！我脑中的低语和呢喃终于消失了！

original: The fog in my mind has lifted. I realize now that I used to be a Lunatic!
translation: 脑中之雾已经消散。我这才意识到之前自己疯了！

original: I have lost my absolute convictions and try to keep an open mind. I have lost the Zealous trait.
translation: 我现在试着用更开放的心态接纳事物，不再像过去那样坚守信仰了。我失去了狂热特质。

original: My frank bluntness won't get me into trouble anymore - I have lost the Honest trait.
translation: 我的坦率直白再也不会令自己陷入麻烦了，我失去了诚实特质。

original: I have learned to take pride in my actions and in my great family. I have lost the Humble trait.
translation: 我为自己的行为和家族感到骄傲。我失去了谦卑特质。

original: Life is good!
translation: 生活真美妙！

original: This morning I woke up with a painful itch. It seems [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has seen fit to blight me with a minor pox for my sinful activities.
translation: 早上起来的时候我痛痒难忍。似乎是[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]因我的罪恶行径降灾于我，让我长出了水痘。

original: This morning I woke up with a painful itch... It seems I have contracted Lover's Pox.
translation: 早上起来的时候我痛痒难忍……我似乎感染上了情人的疱疹。

original: My confessor, [target_priest.GetTitledName] is such an attractive [target_priest.GetManWoman]! I've applied my ample charms and can tell [target_priest.GetSubjectPronoun] is thinking of other things than [target_priest.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 我的告解者[target_priest.GetTitledName]是个魅力十足的[target_priest.GetManWoman]！通过运用自己那令人无法拒绝的魅力，我敢说[target_priest.GetSubjectPronoun]肯定在想着比[target_priest.Religion.GetRandomGodName]更重要的事！

original: Give [target_priest.GetObjectPronoun] a taste of what [target_priest.GetSubjectPronoun] is missing!
translation: 让[target_priest.GetObjectPronoun]得到[target_priest.GetSubjectPronoun]所想的东西！

original: I do so love teasing the dear [target_priest.GetManWoman]...
translation: 我真的很爱挑逗[target_priest.GetManWoman]……

original: Recently, I have amused myself with seducing a handsome young guard. He follows me around like a puppy now... a very big, muscular puppy!
translation: 最近我总是以勾引一位年轻的卫士为乐。他现在像狗一样的跟着我……一条又大又壮的狗！

original: Make him a squire and keep him as my lover...
translation: 给他个身份，让他成为我的情人……

original: Give him a tumble and I'll have the most loyal bodyguard ever!
translation: 给他点甜头，我就能得到最忠诚的卫士了！

original: It's been fun, but I should aim higher.
translation: 确实很有趣，但我应该把目标放在更高远的地方。

original: I've had my eye on a feisty young scullery maid with huge... intellect for some time now. Though she skillfully dodges the attentions of every boy and greybeard at court, I have her blushing furiously whenever I gaze into her eyes. Seduced and wrapped around my finger, this sharp lass could be very useful...
translation: 我已关注一位活泼而有大……智慧的年轻洗碗女仆一段时间了。尽管她熟练地回避着宫廷内老少爷们的注意，但只要我一凝视着她的双眼，她的脸就飞快地红起来。通过勾引，我可以把她玩弄于鼓掌之间，没准这位敏锐的女孩可以派上大用场……

original: Make her a lady and keep her as my mistress...
translation: 给她个身份，让她成为我的情妇……

original: Bed her and make her mine. What a spy she'll make!
translation: 睡了她，交个炮友。她会成为一个很好的间谍！

original: A common wench? I can do better!
translation: 一个普通乡下妞？我可以上个更好的！

original: I see her flit past out of the corner of my eye, naked and red-haired, giggling - the nymph who lives in the garden. Always teasing me, never showing herself clearly. What must I do to win her heart?
translation: 我看见花仙子披着红色长发，赤身裸体从我的眼角掠过。她总是喜欢挑逗我，却不轻易示人，我该怎样赢得她的芳心呢？

original: The magnificent old rose bush! She must be its spirit.
translation: 高贵典雅的玫瑰花丛！那肯定就是她！

original: Wait... why am I out here in my smallclothes at this hour?
translation: 等等……我怎么在这个点穿着紧身衣出现在这里？

original: You enter the rose bush, professing your love.
translation: 你来到了玫瑰花丛，开始示爱。

original: When I staggered out of the rose bush hours had passed, my head filled with carnal but vague memories. I am bleeding all over from the cruel thorns. The voluptuous dryad has exacted her price...
translation: 当我终于蹒跚地走出玫瑰丛的时候，已经过去好几个小时了。我现在满脑子都是模糊的肉体记忆，全身都被刺扎出了血，看来要干这磨人的小妖精得付出点代价……

original: Will I ever see her again?
translation: 我还能再见到她吗？

original: Today the servants found a newborn baby in a basket under the magical rose bush of my dryad lover!
translation: 今天，仆人们在玫瑰花丛中的一个篮筐里，发现了个新生儿。那一定是我和仙女情人的种！

original: Proclaim that little [target_baby.GetFirstName] is my [target_baby.GetSonDaughter]!
translation: 向大家宣布小[target_baby.GetFirstName]是我的[target_baby.GetSonDaughter]！

original: [target_baby.GetFirstName] will be well cared for.
translation: 我会好生照顾[target_baby.GetFirstName]的。

original: The centaur beckons to me, massive muscles flexing. I have never seen anything more masculine in my life!
translation: 半人马靠近了我，弯曲的肌肉虬结有力。我从未见过这么有男人味的人！

original: I am overcome by his musky scent.
translation: 我被他的麝香味所征服。

original: Wait... a centaur? In our stables?!
translation: 等等……一头半人马？在我的马厩里？！

original: You succumb to your desires.
translation: 屈从于你的欲望。

original: I came to in a state of bliss, mind filled with foggy images of the stunningly handsome centaur and our night of passion.
translation: 我醒来时感觉幸福无比，满脑子都是那头帅呆了的半人马和我们那销魂的一夜。

original: Will I ever see him again?
translation: 我还能再碰见他吗？

original: The misery of my captivity is only broken when I get to apply my charms on the gaoler. I can tell the ugly lout desires me... perhaps I can exploit his weakness to escape?
translation: 如果想要摆脱被囚禁的悲惨命运，就得用自己的魅力征服狱卒。我敢说那个丑家伙肯定对我图谋不轨……也许可以利用这个弱点逃脱？

original: Come here, handsome!'
translation: 来嘛~帅哥~

original: It is too risky.
translation: 太冒险了。

original: The gaoler unlocked the cell and entered, leering. As he started to fondle me, I suggested heading to a more romantic location. He burst out laughing, slapped me on the rump and left, snickering scornfully.
translation: 狱卒打开牢笼，淫笑着走了进来。就在他开始抚摸我的时候，我向他建议到一个更嗨的地方。他突然大笑起来，用力拍了下我的屁股，对我轻蔑的扫了一眼就离开了。

original: I am sure his [Root.Host.GetMasterMistress], [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], will hear of this...
translation: 我猜他的主人[Root.Host.GetMasterMistress]，[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，一定会知道这件事的……

original: My prisoner, [From.GetTitledName], attempted to use her female charms on the gaoler to escape. Fortunately, he did not fall for her wiles.
translation: 我的女囚，[From.GetTitledName]，尝试勾引狱卒逃跑。幸运的是，狱卒没上她的套。

original: Spunky! I say she has earned better quarters.
translation: 干得漂亮！我为她准备了个更好的去处。

original: Reward the gaoler for his integrity.
translation: 为狱卒的正直奖励他。

original: The [GetRootFromInsult]! Throw her in the oubliette.
translation: [GetRootFromInsult]！把她打入密牢。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was so impressed by my initiative with the gaoler that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] personally escorted me out of the dungeon to better accomodations. It should be easier to escape from here...
translation: 我对狱卒的主动给[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]留下了深刻的印象，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]亲自将我从地牢押解到待遇更好的地方。这样逃出去就更容易了……

original: I am grateful.
translation: 我感激涕零。

original: When my captor [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] learned of my seduction attempt, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] had me thrown in the Oubliette!
translation: 当那个关着我的[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]听说了我勾引狱卒的事后，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]把我打入了密牢！

original: The [GetRootFromInsult]! I will die in this hole...
translation: [GetRootFromInsult]！我要死在这了！……

original: The gaoler unlocked the cell and entered, leering. As he started to fondle me, I suggested heading to a more romantic location. He eagerly snuck me past a few other guards to his own cot, where I had to do things I am not proud of... Then I bashed him on the head with a heavy jug, grabbed his keys and clothes and made my escape!
translation: 狱卒打开牢笼，淫笑着走了进来。就在他开始抚摸我的时候，我向他建议到一个更嗨的地方。狱卒立刻带着我骗过了数名守卫，溜到了他的小屋。在那，我不得不做些羞羞的事情，然后我用一个大罐猛砸了他的头，夺走了他的钥匙和行头，开始了逃亡之旅！

original: Freedom!
translation: 自由了！

original: My chief gaoler was seduced by my prisoner, the wily [From.GetTitledName]. He took her to his cot where she bashed him on the head with a wine jug and managed to make her escape!
translation: 我的牢头被那个狡诈的小婊砸[From.GetTitledName]勾住了魂。他把她带到了自己的住处，还被那个囚犯用酒罐砸了头跑掉了！

original: Throw the idiot in the Oubliette!
translation: 把那个蠢货扔进密牢！

original: My concubine, [target_consort.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], does not love me. While love is not exactly necessary, I'd still like to see her beautiful face light up with smiles and laughter... so I've decided to romance her!
translation: 我的小妾[target_consort.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]不大喜欢我。虽然我们之间并不一定需要爱，但还是想看到她的漂亮脸蛋上浮现出笑容……所以我决定跟她玩玩浪漫！

original: Turn on the charm
translation: 施展魅力

original: The seduction of [This.GetFirstName] begins
translation: 勾引[This.GetFirstName]的行动开始了！

original: I did get my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] to laugh today, as I told her a silly joke about two squirrels. I think she is warming up to me...
translation: 今天我给我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]讲了关于两只松鼠的笑话，终于让她笑了出来。我想她开始对我产生好感了……

original: I can tell my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is finally falling in love with me. She snuggled up to me as we watched the sunset together from the roof of the great tower.
translation: 我敢说我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]终于爱上我了。我们在高塔的屋顶上一起看夕阳西下，她依偎在我的怀里。

original: Good, that gladdens me!
translation: 这感觉真棒！

original: Thanks to my romantic efforts, sweet [From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], has also become my lover. It feels great to be rid of the cold awkwardness around her!
translation: 在一场浪漫过后，亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]，我的[GetFromRelation]，也同时成为了我的情人。让冰山美人解冻的感觉真是太好了！

original: Finally!
translation: 终于！

original: Today, [From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], confessed that she has forgiven me for her abduction. She has grown to like her new life in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]... and me.
translation: 今天，[From.GetFirstName]，我的[GetFromRelation]，跟我说她不再记恨我绑架她了。她渐渐习惯了[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的生活……还有我。

original: I am relieved!
translation: 解脱了！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not warming up to me at all. She laughs at my jokes, true, but not because she finds them funny, but with scorn. She told me outright that she despises me!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]对我并没有产生好感。对于我讲的笑话她确实是笑了，不过她并没觉得那多有意思，她发出的是轻蔑的笑声。她直言不讳地表达了对我的鄙视！

original: I'll just have to keep at it!
translation: 我会坚持下去的！

original: I give up. Perhaps I should put her aside...
translation: 我放弃。或许应该把她打入冷宫……

original: Having many lovers is exciting and fulfilling. So much love, so much desire... but so little time! I feel like I'm burning the candle at both ends.
translation: 同时拥有众多情人让我感到既兴奋又满足。我的情人们个个如狼似虎，对爱充满欲望……但是我不可能面面俱到。感觉长此以往下去我很快就会油尽灯枯。

original: I can make this work!
translation: 我吃得消！

original: Break up with [first_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
translation: 和[first_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]分手

original: Break up with [second_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
translation: 和[second_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]分手

original: Break up with [third_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
translation: 和[third_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]分手

original: My beloved [my_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is suffering from [my_lover.GetPossPronoun] bad marriage with [my_lover.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps I should suggest a romantic retreat to the countryside, just the two of us (and our most trusted retainers)?
translation: 我亲爱的[my_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]正遭受着[my_lover.GetPossPronoun]和[my_lover.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]的失败婚姻之苦。也许我该建议我们俩（还有最忠诚的侍从）一起去乡下来一场浪漫的旅行？

original: I yearn for [my_lover.GetPossPronoun] embrace!
translation: 我渴望[my_lover.GetPossPronoun]拥抱！

original: No. What if [my_lover.Spouse.GetFirstName] were to find out?
translation: 不。万一被[my_lover.Spouse.GetFirstName]发现了呢？

original: The suggestion is made. [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] gets to decide...
translation: 我提出了建议。就等[This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]回话了……

original: Ripped pillows, broken furniture, shattered vases... My marriage to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has devolved into an unending torment of bitter arguments and fiery rows. I would be depressed, but my lover, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], just suggested that we retire to the countryside for a few days of carefree romance and passion!
translation: 扯坏的枕头，破烂的家具，还有碎裂的瓦罐……我和[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的婚姻中只有无尽的折磨和激烈的争吵。我本打算就此消沉，然而我的情人，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，向我建议去乡下来一场无忧无虑，浪漫而又富有激情的旅行！

original: What a splendid idea!
translation: 说走就走！

original: No... let's be together right here under [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s nose!
translation: 不……让我们就在这里，在[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的眼皮底下！

original: I wish... but we can't risk it.
translation: 我的确想……但不敢冒这个险。

original: We can't! The Watcher... he sees all!
translation: 我们不能这样！有人……一直盯着我们！

original: We risk discovery by [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
translation: 我们冒着被[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]发现的风险。

original: There is almost no risk of discovery by [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]根本发现不了我们。

original: [From.GetFirstName] convinced me to stay in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] so that we could be together right under [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s nose. We even made love in [From.Spouse.GetPossPronoun] bed!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说服我留在[From.Capital.Capital.GetName]。这样我们就能在[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]的眼皮底下同居了。我们甚至在[From.Spouse.GetPossPronoun]床上做爱！

original: We are so naughty...
translation: 这招我喜欢……

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and I spent a few days of romance and passion in a country house far away from the prying eyes of [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]和我在远离[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]的眼线监视的乡村中度过了浪漫而又激情的几天……

original: I am so happy! Exhausted too...
translation: 我好幸福！感觉不胜腰力……

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] declined my suggestion that we spend some time together alone in a country house, for fear of upsetting [From.GetPossPronoun] [From.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]拒绝了我提出的去乡村共度几日的建议，只因怕惹恼了[From.GetPossPronoun][From.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]。

original: Such a wasted opportunity!
translation: 真是浪费机会！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] declined my suggestion that we spend some time together alone in a country house, mumbling about a Watcher with 'cruel eyes' who sees all...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]拒绝了我提出的去乡村共度几日的建议，咕哝着说有人一直在盯着我们……

original: My poor love, I fear [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is losing it!
translation: 我可怜的情人，我怀疑[From.GetSubjectPronoun]的脑子进水了！

original: Aagh! Not the Watcher! I must hide...
translation: 哦不！有人盯着我们！我得藏起来……

original: Life in the shadows is a risky affair - eavesdroppers can be discovered, plots can backfire, and vengeful victims come after you dagger in hand! I am not proud of what I do, but it is for the greater good.
translation: 阴影中的生活往往充斥着凶险——窃听可能被察觉，密谋可能被反噬，受害者的报复也可能接踵而至！我对自己的所作所为并不感到骄傲，但这的确能帮我获得更大的利益。

original: Even the mightiest army can be defeated by a single [Root.GetManWoman]. Cut off the head and the body falls. I am [Root.GetFirstName] - [Root.GetMasterMistress] of Shadows.
translation: 即使是最强大的军队也可能被区区一个[Root.GetManWoman]所打败，身首异处。我是[Root.GetFirstName]——暗影之[Root.GetMasterMistress]。

original: I shall rule from the shadows.

original: I shall strike terror into the hearts of my foes!
translation: 我会把恐惧深深扎进敌人的心里！

original: And yet, I won't let the shadows define me...
translation: 然而，我不会让阴影限制我……

original: I - and my trusted snoops and sneaks - will keep a very close eye on the activities of [From.GetTitledName]... a close eye indeed.
translation: 我和我最出色的密探们会时刻留意[From.GetTitledName]的动向……

original: There is no point spying on [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] anymore, considering [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is dead!
translation: 再侦查[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经毫无意义，因为[FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]已经死了！

original: Time to turn my attention elsewhere.

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has ended up in prison, so there's no point spying on [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] anymore.

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], the target of my current spy efforts, has tragically fallen comatose, making the endeavour pointless.
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]，我的侦查目标，悲剧性的瘫在了床上，再查下去毫无意义。

[FromFromFrom.GetPossPronounCap] mother, [FromFromFrom.Mother.GetTitledFirstName] had a torrid love affair with [FromFromFrom.RealFather.GetTitledName]. How should I use this shocking information?

original: The [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: [GetRootFromInsult]！

original: One of my informants, a young soldier with more vices than he can afford, has managed to gain the trust of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and now often stands guard outside [FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun] door. I don't understand how the fellow managed it, but who am I to look a gift horse in the mouth? For enough gold, he might be persuaded to get rid of [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]... violently.
translation: 我的密探之一，一个恶贯满盈的战士，得到了[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]的信任，还经常在[FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun]门外站岗。我不知道他是怎么做到的，但是他的价值毋庸置疑。只要给足了金子，他就能帮我除掉[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]……并且悄无踪迹。

original: Yes, that would be expedient.

original: Murder is going too far!

original: I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. Another assailant is trying to force a rag into my mouth. Holding my nose too... can't breathe...
translation: 我尝试在床上坐起来，但是有人把我按住了！是那个上周因为一张忠诚的脸被我提拔为守卫的强壮武士！另一个袭击者把破布塞进了我的嘴里，捏上了我的鼻子，我感到……无法……呼……吸……

original: I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. There is a skinny little fellow with him, grinning viciously as he produces a dagger and stabs me! Screaming and thrashing about, I manage to kick the guard in the groin and break free. I punch the other one in the nose and rush from the room, trailing blood.
translation: 我尝试在床上坐起来，但是有人把我按住了！是那个上周因为一张忠诚的脸被我提拔为守卫的强壮武士！他旁边还有一个瘦小的同伙，他带着歹毒的笑容用匕首扎了我！我拼命呼救，奋力一搏，狠狠地踹了守卫的肚子一脚，挣脱了束缚。然后又给了小个子的鼻子一拳，拖着一路的血迹逃出了房间。

original: I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. There is a skinny little fellow with him, grinning viciously as he produces a dagger. Screaming and thrashing about, I manage to kick the guard in the groin and break free. I punch the other one in the nose and rush from the room!
translation: 我尝试在床上坐起来，但是有人把我按住了！是那个上周因为一张忠诚的脸被我提拔为守卫的强壮武士！他旁边还有一个瘦小的同伙，带着歹毒的笑容掏出了一把匕首。我拼命呼救，奋力一搏，狠狠地踹了守卫的肚子一脚，挣脱了束缚。然后又给了小个子的鼻子一拳，迅速逃离了房间！

original: I don't want to die like this!
translation: 我不想就这样死去！

original: [From.GetTitledName] sends [From.GetPossPronoun] regards!'
